thread.title: Heather Watson knocked out of Hong Kong Open quarter-finals by Sam Stosur - Thetelegraphand Argus

author: Source: Thetelegraphand Argus
title: Heather Watson knocked out of Hong Kong Open quarter-finals by Sam Stosur - Thetelegraphand Argus
text:
Heather Watson lost the last 11 games as her run at the Hong Kong Open came to an end in the quarter-finals against Sam Stosur. Watson, now the British number two after Johanna Konta's rapid rise, made a fine start against former US Open champion Stosur and led by a set and 3-1.
 Thetelegraphand Argus.
